name: Chronicles of Tamria
description:
Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move and the space bar to select. 'Esc'  will open the menu bar and 'Page Up' or 'Page Down' will open your log. Controller support is currently available, however mobile controls are not complete. Mobile devices can use 'Click-to-Move' and select skills, but the journals are not accessible with touch input at this time.

Story:

You play as Darrus, a new adventurer in the land of Tamria. After arriving in the port town of Tera's Landing, you are set on joining the Magistrate Guard. Chapter one brings to light the inner workings of the continent. Aid the chancellor by finding the notable mage, and ambassador to the Magistrate, Serath.
